description: Minimal determinant (negated) of n X n persymmetric matrix with entries {-1,0,+1}.
comments: A persymmetric (or Hankel) matrix has M[ i,j ] = M[ i-k,j+k ] for all i and j (matrix is constant along antidiagonals).
author: _Fred Lunnon_, Dec 11 1999
extensions: More terms from Sam Handler (sam_5_5_5_0(AT)yahoo.com), Aug 08 2006
